titleStmt.title: The second part of Massaniello his body taken out of the town-ditch, and solemnly buried, with epitaphs upon him. A continuation of the tumult; the D. of Guise made generalissimo; taken prisoner by young Don John of Austria. The end of the commotions. By J.H. Esquire.
Revolutioni di Napoli. Part 2. English.
titleStmt.author: Giraffi, Alessandro.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A44753 of text R215813 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing H3114). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 201 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 62 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
